text: 16.18 Jon 1.42, Epe 2.20, Lep 21.14 Pen yad nep anɨb apin, nad Pita, kab kɨles tek nɨŋɨd apan agak. Binɨb yad yɨl yenɨgabal okok, yad kɨlop gen, kɨli kal tek yenɨgabal, kab kɨles tɨmel adek anɨb ak agak. Kumeb kɨles ak binɨb anɨb okok kɨlop apɨl gɨ tɨmel gek apyap pakɨnɨgel tek ma yenɨgab agak.
